newsitem.title: CHINA: Righteous says parent in shr sale talks.
newsitem.headline: Righteous says parent in shr sale talks.

text.p: Righteous (Holdings) Ltd said on Wednesday its major shareholder Goldbells Enterprises Ltd is in talks with an independent third party in relation to a possible acquisition of all its 40 percent stake in Righteous.
The indicative price of the possible deal was HK$0.40 per share against the proforma net asset value of the leather goods retailing group of HK$0.19 per share, it said in a statement.

Trading on the stock was expected to resume on Wednesday after being suspended on Monday afternoon pending for an announcement. It was last traded at HK$0.51, representing 2.7 times of the proforma net asset value, the company added.
"Other than the negotiation disclosed, the board is not aware of any reasons for such a premium," Righteous said.
